Reviews.Title: “There is much better”
Reviews.Author: tymobelgo
Reviews.Content: You will receive an apartment depending availability : you can be lucky and get a larger one or receive something else, far from being what is displayed on the pictures. Old apartments also are in their portfolio. This is the reply I got when asking compensation for one night without heating : "I see that you got a bigger and more expensive 2-room apt. instead a 1-room apt. and in the past (Dec. 2009) you got a 4-room apt. instead a 2-room apt. It looks like a fair trade, isn't it?!" Honestly, one room WITH heating would have been just great. Be the judge.

HotelInfo.Name: Nollendorfplatz City-Apartments
HotelInfo.Address: Nollendorfplatz 7, 10777 Berlin, Germany
